attributes.action: Stop the EU interfering for the sake of it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since we joined the EU they have sought to change little pieces of our country for the sake of the change. Currency, Decimalisation, Measurements etc. Nothing in these changes benefited our country; we were working quite well in those departments.
Looking at the news, they are even trying to take the little crown symbol off of our pint glasses! Why? because they can. No other reason.
They are also trying to make it illegal for manufacturers to print imperial measurements on their packaging.
All this meddling is needless and our government must be strong enough to put the EU in its place.
Draw a line Mr. Prime Minister and don't allow them to cross it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
